title: Saradomin platelegs

properties.value: The Saradomin platelegs are a decorated version of rune platelegs that are affiliated with the god Saradomin. Sharing the same stats as rune platelegs (with the addition of a +1 prayer bonus), the Saradomin platelegs also look visually similar. Their appearance differs in that they feature an ornamental white trim around the symbol of Saradomin. The platelegs require 40 Defence to wear and cannot be made using the Smithing skill. Players can obtain Saradomin platelegs as a reward from completing hard Treasure Trails.

Advanced data
Item ID2663

The Saradomin platelegs are a decorated version of rune platelegs that are affiliated with the god Saradomin. Sharing the same stats as rune platelegs (with the addition of a +1 prayer bonus), the Saradomin platelegs also look visually similar. Their appearance differs in that they feature an ornamental white trim around the symbol of Saradomin. The platelegs require 40 Defence to wear and cannot be made using the Smithing skill. Players can obtain Saradomin platelegs as a reward from completing hard Treasure Trails.

These platelegs are a constituent of the Saradomin armour set which consists of the following items: Saradomin full helm, Saradomin platebody, Saradomin platelegs or Saradomin plateskirt, and Saradomin kiteshieldâ€”all of which are decorative versions of their respective rune armour counterparts. Wearing any piece of this armour set causes followers of Saradomin to become unaggressive to the player.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The platelegs's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -7 to -11.

12 June 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "Saradomin legs" to "Saradomin platelegs".

27 March 2014
(update | poll)

The god platelegs now gives a +1 Prayer bonus.

[[File:Saradomin platelegs detail.png|left|90px]]
The '''Saradomin platelegs''' are a decorated version of [[rune platelegs]] that are affiliated with the god [[Saradomin]]. Sharing the same stats as rune platelegs (with the addition of a +1 [[prayer bonus]]), the Saradomin platelegs also look visually similar. Their appearance differs in that they feature an ornamental white trim around the symbol of Saradomin. The platelegs require 40 [[Defence]] to wear and '''cannot''' be made using the [[Smithing]] skill. Players can obtain Saradomin platelegs as a reward from completing [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]] [[Treasure Trails]].

These platelegs are a constituent of the [[Saradomin armour]] set which consists of the following items: [[Saradomin full helm]], [[Saradomin platebody]], Saradomin platelegs or [[Saradomin plateskirt]], and [[Saradomin kiteshield]]â€”all of which are decorative versions of their respective [[Rune armour|rune armour counterparts]]. Wearing any piece of this armour set causes followers of Saradomin to become unaggressive to the player.
